title: AssignmentLifeCycleType
description: Contains a collection dates related to the assignment.

startDate.description: The first date the person is classed as a worker.

expectedStartDate.description: The date the worker is expected to start working.

endDate.description: The date the contract is complete or the worker is terminated.

probationaryStartDate.description: The first day of a worker's probationary status.

probationaryEndDate.description: The last day of a worker's probationary status.
